arktsVersion_1_0.messageText: Use arrow functions instead of function expressions (arkts-no-func-expressions)
Object literals cannot be used as type declarations (arkts-no-obj-literals-as-types)
Object literal must correspond to some explicitly declared class or interface (arkts-no-untyped-obj-literals)

arktsVersion_1_1.messageText: Use arrow functions instead of function expressions (arkts-no-func-expressions)

Object literal must correspond to some explicitly declared class or interface (arkts-no-untyped-obj-literals)
